ygData.subject: RE: Bard Revenge
ygData.msgSnippet: nope, he means level 27 song, solon s song of the sirens that actually charms npcs.  its fun to charm dvinn Minkin Nehoc Solusek Ro
ygData.messageBody:
nope, he means level 27 song, solon's song of the sirens that actually
charms npcs. its fun to charm dvinn

Minkin Nehoc
Solusek Ro

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) [SMTP:kblair@...]
> Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 2:56 PM
> To: eqbards@onelist.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] Bard Revenge
>
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> > Once you get high enough to charm - that IS something
> > a bard can do, charm the mob - the caster wastes his
> > manna, mob goes uncharmed, proceed to kill.
>
> By Charm are you talking about the level 15 song? I've had to resort to
> using that song before when someone really got on my nerves to clear the
> damage list and then start bellowing and hitting it as hard as I can
> hoping
> to finish it off first. As a Bard (15th song) it's the only way I know of
> to
> keep something I'm fighting from being stolen. And when you'd much rather
> be
> playing songs to improve your speed or AC or something, that's a real
> bummer.
>
